synthesis_conditions.solvents: EtOH (1 mL), DMF (1 mL), Py (0.05 mL)
synthesis_conditions.temperature: heated at a constant rate 1.5°C/min to 85°C for 12 h, then cooled at a constant rate 1°C/min to room temperature
synthesis_conditions.solubility: insoluble in H2O and common organic solvents

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: H2CDO⋅H2O (8.1 mg, 0.04 mmol), Cu(NO3)2⋅2.5H2O (9.3 mg, 0.04 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.solvents: DMF (1 mL), EtOH (1 mL), Py (0.1 mL)
synthesis_conditions.temperature: heated at a constant rate 1.5°C/min to 85°C for 12 h, then cooled at a constant rate 1°C/min to room temperature
synthesis_conditions.solubility: insoluble in H2O and common organic solvents

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with DMF (1 mL) and EtOH (1 mL) three times
synthesis_conditions.color_change: from light blue to light green
synthesis_conditions.solubility: insoluble in H2O and common organic solvents

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with DMF (1 mL) and EtOH (1 mL) three times and dried
synthesis_conditions.color_change: from light blue to light green
synthesis_conditions.solubility: insoluble in H2O and common organic solvents

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with DMF (1 mL) and EtOH (1 mL) three times and dried, then washed with H2O three times and dried
synthesis_conditions.temperature: heated at a constant rate 1.5°C/min to 85°C for 12 h, then cooled at a constant rate 1°C/min to room temperature, followed by successive heating at a constant rate 1.5°C/min to 105°C for 23 h and cooling at a constant rate 1°C/min to room temperature

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with DMF (1 mL) and EtOH (1 mL) three times and dried, then washed with H2O three times and dried
synthesis_conditions.temperature: room temperature, placed at 4°C for three days
synthesis_conditions.yield: 8 mg, 34% total yield based on H2CDO·H2O
